title: Monolith (1993 - USA) [Bill Paxton, John Hurt] sci fi action
description:
Monolith (1993 - Germany, USA)

Action / Science Fiction

starring . . . . Bill Paxton, Lindsay Frost, John Hurt, Louis Gossett Jr.
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107597/


If you've seen 2001: A Space Odyssey you know what a "monolith" is. The story concerns two eternally bickering cops who stumble onto a government secret. It seems that a huge, malevolent monolith has come hurtling to Earth and it's growing bigger and nastier with each passing day. Making matters worse, the evil being is invisible (thereby saving a fortune in special effects).


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 704x400, 25.000 fps, 2018 Kbps, 01h31m09s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
